metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32280 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in fig2dev before 3.2.8.. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function compute_closed_spline() located in trans_spline.c. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service. The fixed version of fig2dev is 3.2.8.

notes.Note: leosilva> fig2dev is a dependency for xfig and this issue would only affected xfig it if fig2dev is installed. Marking all xfig as not affected as that issue should be fixed in fig2dev.

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.8-2').
